languages.text: {n}Губы девушки в полумаске изгибаются от радости вперемешку со страхом. Она кидает короткий взгляд на мужчину в сюртуке, потом кланяется вам. Мужчина с облегчением выдыхает:{/n} "Спасибо вам. Я знал, что Звездн{mf|ого|ую} Госпо{mf|дина|жу} не обмануть интригами".

{n}The young woman's lip curls with a mixture of joy and fear. She glances briefly at the man in the jacket, then gives you a bow. The man sighs with relief and says,{/n} "Thank you. I knew that no intrigue could fool the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}."
languages.original_text: {n}Губы девушки в полумаске изгибаются от радости вперемешку со страхом. Она кидает короткий взгляд на мужчину в сюртуке, потом кланяется вам. Мужчина с облегчением выдыхает:{/n} "Спасибо вам. Я знал, что Звездн{mf|ого|ую} Госпо{mf|дина|жу} не обмануть интригами".

traits.locale_text: {n}The young woman's lips curl with a mixture of joy and fear. She quickly glances at the man in the jacket, then gives you a bow. The man sighs with relief.{/n} "Thank you. I knew that no intrigue could mislead the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}."

{n}The young woman's lip curls with a mixture of joy and fear. She glances briefly at the man in the jacket, then gives you a bow. The man sighs with relief and says,{/n} "Thank you. I knew that no intrigue could fool the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}."

{n}The young woman's lip curls with a mixture of joy and fear. She glances briefly at the man in the jacket, then gives you a bow. The man sighs with relief and says,{/n} "Thank you. I knew that no intrigue could fool the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}."

languages.text: {n}年轻女子翘起了嘴唇，既欣喜、又恐惧。她瞥了穿着夹克的老人一眼，随即向你鞠了一躬。与此同时，老人松了口气，开了口。{/n}“谢谢您，来自上界的大人，我就知道一切诡计都瞒不过您的眼睛。”
languages.original_text: {n}The young woman's lip curls with a mixture of joy and fear. She glances briefly at the man in the jacket, then gives you a bow. The man sighs with relief and says,{/n} "Thank you. I knew that no intrigue could fool the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}."

traits.locale_text: {n}年轻女子翘起了嘴唇，既欣喜、又恐惧。她瞥了穿着夹克的老人一眼，随即向你鞠了一躬。与此同时，老人松了口气，开了口。{/n}“谢谢您，来自上界的大人，我就知道一切诡计都瞒不过您的眼睛。”

languages.text: {n}若い女性の唇が、喜びと恐れの入り混じった表情でわずかに歪んだ。彼女は上着を着た男性に一瞬目をやり、それからあなたに一礼した。男性は安堵の息をつき、こう言った。{/n}「ありがとうございました。どんな陰謀も、天の{mf|君|姫}を欺くことはできないと信じておりました」
languages.original_text: {n}The young woman's lip curls with a mixture of joy and fear. She glances briefly at the man in the jacket, then gives you a bow. The man sighs with relief and says,{/n} "Thank you. I knew that no intrigue could fool the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}."

traits.locale_text: {n}若い女性の唇が、喜びと恐れの入り混じった表情でわずかに歪んだ。彼女は上着を着た男性に一瞬目をやり、それからあなたに一礼した。男性は安堵の息をつき、こう言った。{/n}「ありがとうございました。どんな陰謀も、天の{mf|君|姫}を欺くことはできないと信じておりました」

languages.text: {n}Los labios de la muchacha se tuercen en una mezcla de alegría y temor. Echa una mirada fugaz al hombre enchaquetado, y luego te dedica una reverencia. El hombre suspira aliviado y dice:{/n} «Gracias. Sabía que mi {mf|Señor|Señora} Celestial no se dejaría engañar por semejante argucia».
languages.original_text: {n}The young woman's lip curls with a mixture of joy and fear. She glances briefly at the man in the jacket, then gives you a bow. The man sighs with relief and says,{/n} "Thank you. I knew that no intrigue could fool the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Los labios de la muchacha se tuercen en una mezcla de alegría y temor. Echa una mirada fugaz al hombre enchaquetado, y luego te dedica una reverencia. El hombre suspira aliviado y dice:{/n} «Gracias. Sabía que mi {mf|Señor|Señora} Celestial no se dejaría engañar por semejante argucia».

languages.text: {n}Genç kadın, neşe ve korku için dudağını büküyor. Ceketli adama kısaca bakıp sonra onu selamlıyor. Adam rahat bir nefes alıp konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Teşekkür ederim. Semavi {mf|Lordumuzu|Leydimizi} hiçbir entrikanın kandıramayacağını biliyordum."
languages.original_text: {n}The young woman's lip curls with a mixture of joy and fear. She glances briefly at the man in the jacket, then gives you a bow. The man sighs with relief and says,{/n} "Thank you. I knew that no intrigue could fool the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Genç kadın, neşe ve korku için dudağını büküyor. Ceketli adama kısaca bakıp sonra onu selamlıyor. Adam rahat bir nefes alıp konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Teşekkür ederim. Semavi {mf|Lordumuzu|Leydimizi} hiçbir entrikanın kandıramayacağını biliyordum."

languages.text: {n}La jeune femme retrousse les lèvres dans un rictus mêlant joie et peur. Elle jette un rapide coup d'œil à l'homme en pourpoint puis s'incline devant vous. L'accusé laisse échapper un soupir de soulagement :{/n} « Merci. Je savais que nulle intrigue ne pourrait duper Votre Céleste Seigneurie. »
languages.original_text: {n}The young woman's lip curls with a mixture of joy and fear. She glances briefly at the man in the jacket, then gives you a bow. The man sighs with relief and says,{/n} "Thank you. I knew that no intrigue could fool the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}."

traits.locale_text: {n}La jeune femme retrousse les lèvres dans un rictus mêlant joie et peur. Elle jette un rapide coup d'œil à l'homme en pourpoint puis s'incline devant vous. L'accusé laisse échapper un soupir de soulagement :{/n} « Merci. Je savais que nulle intrigue ne pourrait duper Votre Céleste Seigneurie. »

languages.text: {n}Die Lippen der junge Frau verziehen sich zu einer Mischung aus Freund und Angst. Sie wirft dem Mann in der Jacke einen kurzen Blick zu und verbeugt sich dann vor dir. Der Mann seufzt erleichtert und sagt:{/n} "Danke. Ich wusste, dass keine Intrige {mf|den himmlischen Herrn|die himmlische Herrin} täuschen kann."
languages.original_text: {n}The young woman's lip curls with a mixture of joy and fear. She glances briefly at the man in the jacket, then gives you a bow. The man sighs with relief and says,{/n} "Thank you. I knew that no intrigue could fool the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}."

Der Mann seufzt erleichtert und sagt:{/n} "Danke. Ich wusste, dass keine Intrige {mf|den himmlischen Herrn|die himmlische Herrin} täuschen kann."
